resources.string: Press the back button to pause anytime.

Tap anywhere to resume.

Press the back button to
return to the start screen.
Tap the ball once during the cue to earn points.
Tap the ball multiple times during the cue and until the counter is depleted to earn points.
The central object of the game to be manipulated by the player.
The signal that the ball must be tapped to score a point.
One of the eyes of the cue.
